name: GrassGames Hearts 2 for iPhone
description:
Play Hearts on your iPhone with ease against computer opponents or real life opponents.

You can easily play network games against other iPhone users, iPad, Mac & PC users also!

Play the way you like Hearts to be with fully customizable game rules (Black Maria, Omnibus, Old Moon, New Moon, etc.).

Multiple card decks, backgrounds, online rankings and much more make this a must for all true Hearts fans.
